tags: Inductively Coupled Plasma Triple Quadrupole Spectrometer
full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement

__Reference No.__: PW-23-01024584
__Publication Date__: 03 February 2023
__Tender Closing Date__: 15 March 2023, 15:00:00

## Solicitation Details

- **Solicitation No.**: 5000071942
- **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering

## Notice Type
The government of Canada, Natural Resources Canada, invites bidders to submit their proposals for **Laboratory Equipment and Supplies** (G-SIN: N6640).

## Services/Supplies Required
CANMETMining requires a new inductively coupled plasma triple quadrupole spectrometer (ICP-MSQQQ) to accurately measure concentrations of trace elements and majors in complex matrices having high total dissolved solids (TDS).

## Eligibility and Selection Criteria
Eligible bidders must have the necessary technical expertise, capabilities and equipment to deliver the required services/supplies. The selection criteria for this procurement are available in the solicitation document.

## Countries Eligible to Participate

* Canada

## Trade Agreements
This solicitation is open to bidders from the following countries due to the application of preferential trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

## How to Obtain the Solicitation Document

The solicitation document can be downloaded from the following link:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/03/395740ce2dd972d57812a6514e85dacb/notice_of_proposed_procurement_npp_-_nrcan_5000071942.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/03/8bf3
